column1: #Text=Wikinews interviews Spanish Paralympic track and field athlete Alberto Suárez Laso
#Text=Laura Hale interviews Alberto Suárez Laso for Wikinews
#Text=Alberto Suárez Laso at the airport in Madrid before departing for France

#Text=With the IPC Athletics World Championships scheduled to start this Friday , Wikinews interviewed Spanish T12 classified long distance runner Alberto Suárez Laso at Madrid – Barajas Airport Monday before he departed for Lyon , France .
#Text=Suárez is scheduled to compete in two events , the T12 5,000 meters and marathon events .
#Text=I 'm interviewing Alberto Suárez , who is a visually-impaired runner competing for Spain in the IPC World Championships .
#Text=Are you going to smash it and give Spain a gold medal ?
#Text=Spanish language : ‍¿Vas a romper el record mundial y darle a España un oro ?
#Text=This time it 's a bit complicated because I 'm going a bit injured .
#Text=‍Esta vez está un poco complicado porque voy un poco lesionado
#Text=You finished second in London [ the 2012 Summer Paralympics ] ?
#Text=For the last three weeks I 've been doing gym and walking machine only .
#Text=I have pain in my Achilles tendon .
#Text=Spanish language : ‍Llevo tres semanas solo con gimnasio y elíptica .
#Text=Tengo dolor en el tendón de Aquiles .
#Text=So , as someone who writes from an international perspective , do you think Spain 's got all that stuff to help you properly ?
#Text=The medical support , stuff to help you recuperate and be a great runner ?
#Text=We 're there , they 've been treating me very well and I hope to be able to run without pain , which is the most important thing .
#Text=I 've got the training , but I need to remove that pain .
#Text=Estamos ahí , me están tratando bastante bien y espero correr sin dolor , que es lo fundamental .
#Text=La preparación la tengo , pero hay que quitar ese dolor .
#Text=So it 's optional for a guy at T-12 ?
#Text=He could , but he 's not too badly impaired .
#Text=So is your preference to run without a guide ?
#Text=It 's complicated because of the pace I run at .
#Text=I would require several guides , and it 's hard to find them .
#Text=Spanish language : ‍Es una complicación por el ritmo al que corro .
#Text=Necesitaría varios guías y es dificil conseguirlos .
#Text=Do most of your competitors run with guides ?
#Text=Well , there are a couple that do run with guides , but the rest do n't .
#Text=Bueno , hay un par de ellos que corren con guía , los demás no .
#Text=Is there anything you would like to say about this competition coming up that people from an international sporting community would find valuable to know ?
#Text=Mm , I do n't know what to say !
